notes.text:
This update for gdm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-16125: Fixed a privilege escalation (bsc#1178150).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: gdm3 versions before 3.36.2 or 3.38.2 would start gnome-initial-setup if gdm3 can't contact the accountservice service via dbus in a timely manner; on Ubuntu (and potentially derivatives) this could be be chained with an additional issue that could allow a local user to create a new privileged account.
notes.title: CVE description
